name: ol-wfst
description: Very simple and small WFST-T client to insert (drawing or uploading), modify and delete features directly on GeoServers using OpenLayers.

scripts.doc: documentation readme src/ol-wfst.ts --quiet=true --access=public --access=undefined --section=API --parse-extension ts && node scripts/external-links.js README.md && prettier --write README.md
scripts.copy-assets: ncp src/assets/ tmp-dist/assets/ && ncp src/assets/ tmp-lib/assets/
scripts.build: npm run precleanstart && tsc --pretty --project ./tsconfig.json && tsc --pretty --project ./tsconfig-dist.json && npm run copy-assets && rollup --config rollup.config.dist.js && rollup --config rollup.config.js
scripts.postbuild: ncp tmp-lib/ol-wfst.d.ts dist/ol-wfst.d.ts && ncp tmp-lib/ol-wfst.d.ts lib/ol-wfst.d.ts && ncp src/assets/css/bootstrap-modal.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-modal.min.css && ncp src/assets/css/bootstrap-modal.min.css lib/css/bootstrap-modal.min.css && del-cli tmp-dist tmp-lib

author: Gast√≥n Zalba
